properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 2:12PM MST until January 2 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow, moderate at times, expected. Total snow
accumulations of 3 to 7 inches with locally higher amounts
possible. Lesser amounts expected below 6000 feet.

* WHERE...Central Yampa River Basin.

* WHEN...From 6 AM Wednesday...New Years Day...to noon MST
Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the holiday commute. A detailed map of
the snowfall can be found at:
www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY...NEW YEARS DAY...TO NOON MST THURSDAY
